name: FooterBaseCard
description: Card-wrapped footer with logo, navigation columns, copyright, and privacy policy link.

copyrightText.note: Copyright text displayed at bottom left

structure.title: string - Column heading (required)
structure.items: Array<{ label: string, href: string }> - Navigation links (required)

columnsRules.note: Array of footer column objects. Each column must have title and items array.

propsSchema.columns: Array<{ title: string, items: Array<{ label: string, href: string }> }> - Footer navigation columns (required)

usageExample: <FooterBaseCard columns={[{ title: 'Product', items: [{ label: 'Features', href: '/features' }, { label: 'Pricing', href: '/pricing' }] }, { title: 'Company', items: [{ label: 'About', href: '/about' }, { label: 'Blog', href: '/blog' }] }]} logoText="Webild" copyrightText="© 2025 | Webild" onPrivacyClick={() => console.log('Privacy clicked')} />
